channel.title: Math Origami on CulDeVu
channel.description: Recent content in Math Origami on CulDeVu

item.title: Origami and the Associated Maths
item.description: So this is going to be another one of those write-it-out-so-that-I-can-better-understand-it sort of things. Just a heads up. This IS a journal, after all, and functions as advertisement second. So. Origami and mathematics. We know that the two are related because, if you fold a piece of paper the same way twice, you’ll get two of the same shape, so there’s rules governing it. And some smart people have tried figuring out those rules.
